description: Contains very basic bugs that should have been discovered by the software developer through basic use. Basic keystroke/mouse actions such as double-click to highlight are ignored, and it logs out the user and suspends the computer when a note is removed.
it doesnt do anything on Opensuse tumbleweed gnome 3.26
i used it since forever however it doesn't work on fedora 30 =(

no issues whatsoever and does the job
LOVE the color personalisations
This app doesn't work at all, please work on it

Running on RHEL 8.3 - the biggest bug I found so far is a faulty drag and drop. The note does not 'keep up' the mouse cursor when dragging and sort of detaches it. I have to drag is really slow and make sure that the mouse cursor stays inside the note.

I would also add the ability to give headers to the notes and some auto align on screen and maybe some basic text editing options like bold, cursive, underline, highlight.
No funciona y eso que estoy en Debian Buster, donde se supone que todo está debidamente testeado y funcionando
summary: No funciona y eso que estoy en Debian 10
